BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to residency requirements for city employees
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 992-A, in relation to the residency requirement for city employees.
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 992 - Residency requirements for city employees.

Items.Title: Resolution supporting the continued operation of the Stella D’Oro Biscuit Company in the Bronx and supporting the efforts of Local 50 and the workers at Stella D’Oro Biscuit Company to maintain their jobs and prevent the closure of the Bronx factory.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Supporting the continued operation of the Stella D’Oro Biscuit Company in the Bronx.

Items.Title: Resolution supporting the continued operation of the Stella D’Oro Biscuit Company in the Bronx and supporting the efforts of Local 50 and the workers at Stella D’Oro Biscuit Company to maintain their jobs and prevent the closure of the Bronx factory.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Supporting the continued operation of the Stella D’Oro Biscuit Company in the Bronx.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to residency requirements for city employees
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 992-A, in relation to the residency requirement for city employees.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Mayor's Veto - Int. No. 992 - Residency requirements for city employees.
